gov.nasa.worldwind.animation
Class CompoundAnimator

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.worldwind.animation.BasicAnimator
      gov.nasa.worldwind.animation.CompoundAnimator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Animator
Direct Known Subclasses:
FlyToFlyViewAnimator, FlyToOrbitViewAnimator
public class CompoundAnimator
extends BasicAnimator

A group of two or more Animators. Can be used to animate more than one value at a time, driven by a single Interpolator.
